name: Italian Sausage Tortellini Bake
author: Dave C
summary: Delicious Italian tortellini dish will have you coming back for seconds.
directions: Heat a large pot over medium heat
Crumble sausage into the saucepan; add onion and green bell pepper
Cook and stir the sausage mixture until the sausage is completely browned, 7 to 10 minutes
Pour marinara sauce and diced tomatoes over the sausage mixture; season with garlic powder and stir
Bring the mixture to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook at a simmer until the diced tomatoes break down into the sauce, 30 to 45 minutes
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook the frozen tortellini at a boil until they float to the top and the filling is hot, 6 to 7 minutes; drain
Gently fold the cooked tortellini into the simmering sauce; cook together another 5 minutes
Pour tortellini and sauce into a 13x9-inch baking dish; top with mozzarella cheese
Bake in preheated oven until cheese is golden brown, 20 to 30 minutes
